text: khuda ne kaaba ko jo (usaka) mohataram ghar hai aur huramat daar maheenon ko aur kurabaanee ko aur us jaanavar ko jisake gale mein (qurabaanee ke vaaste) patte daal die gae hon logon ke aman qaayam rakhane ka sabab qaraar diya yah isalie ki tum jaan lo ki khuda jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai yaqeenan (sab) jaanata hai aur ye bhee (samajh lo) ki beshak khuda har cheez se vaaqiph hai
